name: "Gigantique" Bag
effect:
You have no maximum hand size.
[Activate], Pay 1 for each card in your hand [>] Draw a card.
"Is your sack 'Gigantique?!'" -Haris Pilton

name: "Tubs" Klankbopple
effect: When this ally enters play, he may deal 4 melee damage to target ally with cost 4 or less.
"I never had to work this hard before."

name: A Tale of Valor
effect:
Pay 4 to complete this quest.
Reward: Reveal the top card of your deck and put it into your hand. Your hero heals damage from itself equal to that card's cost.
"Perhaps you've heard the praises of our missing hero?" -Highlord Trion Fordring

name: Ancestral Awakening
effect: Talent: Restoration

name: Angrathar the Wrathgate
effect:
When a card enters an opposing graveyard from anywhere, add a rattle counter.
On your turn: 2, [Activate], Remove three rattle counters [>] Put a 3 [Melee] / 3 [Health] Scourge ally token into play.
Crafted to look like the Helm of Domination, worn by the Lich King himself.

name: Angry Dread
effect: When this weapon enters play, you may draw a card.
"So I'll get to beat someone over the head with this? I'm in!" -Parvink

name: Annihilate
effect: Talent: Combat
"You expend yourself too quickly." -Timmo Shadestep

name: Anti-Magic Shell
effect: Talent: Unholy
"I find your so-called mastery of magic to be lacking." -Randolphe Mortimer

name: Antyr
effect: When this ally enters play, you may destroy target ability that's not attached to a friendly card.
"Look how easily your strength fails in the presence of the elements."

name: Apply This Twice Daily
effect:
Pay 3 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card.
If a hero or ally you controlled healed damage this turn, draw another card.
"This elixir should protect against their spit. Offer it to Ko'char for me, will you?" -Zort

name: Archmage Barstow
effect: Talent: Arcane
Professions: Blacksmithing, Skinning
"The time has come to 'enlighten' the Scourge with the proper use and technique of magic."

name: Arlen the Untamed
effect: Allies you control have Assault 1 while you control a Form.
"The call of the wild guides my steps, and you would do well to follow."

name: Armored Blue Wind Rider
effect:
[Activate] [>] Ready a location you control.
When you place a resource face up, you may remove a counter from target location.
(Mounts can't attack or be attacked.)
"They are quite restless when they aren't soaring through the skies of Northrend." -Mei Francis

name: Armored Snowy Gryphon
effect:
[Activate] [>] Ready a location you control.
When you place a resource face up, you may choose a counter on target location and add another of those counters to it.
(Mounts can't attack or be attacked.)
"They have proven capable of weathering the harsh winds of Northrend." -Mei Frances

name: Astani Dawngrace
effect: Protector, Assault 1, Mend 1
"Allow me to introduce you to the Light."

name: Astral Recall
effect: Talent: Enhancement
"It be da fool's assumption dat once someth'n be gone, it be lost forever." -Mojo Shaper Ojo'mon

name: Aurius
effect: When a friendly Paladin is destroyed, it may deal 3 unpreventable holy damage to target hero or ally.
"Before I submit to this impending death, there is one last thing I must do."

name: Ayluro Nightwind
effect:
Mend 5
This ally can't heal heroes.
"I must tend to our wounded quickly."

name: Azjol-anak Champion
effect:
Nerubian Reputation
This ally has +3 / +3 while an ability, ally, and equipment are in your graveyard.

name: Bantham, Jadefist Apprentice
effect:
Protector
This ally has -2 / -2 while attacking.
"Sooner or later, all of Azeroth will come to appreciate just how masterful Kulvo truly was."

name: Banzai
effect: This ally has +1 ATK for each card in opposing graveyards.
"With all the corpses around, Banzai is going to have a feast!" -Thaka Deadeye

name: Bestial Rage
effect: Talent: Beast Mastery, Fury
"Let loose da animal within, bruddah!" -Sen'zir Beastwalker

name: Blazemistress Lindsey
effect: [Activate], Discard an ability [>] This ally deals 4 fire damage to target hero or ally.
"The dancing flames are quite mesmerizing, are they not?"

name: Blazing Hippogryph
effect:
Argent Crusade Reputation
[Activate] [>] Ready a location you control.
When you place a resource face up, your hero may heal all damage from target Unique ally you control.
(Mounts can't attack or be attacked.)
"How can the Scourge hope to escape while the Light now rides on these golden wings?" -Durizon, Champion of A'dal

name: Blood Rune
effect: Talent: Blood
"There are times when blood is stronger than steel." -Erondra Frostmoon

name: Bluffstalker Honovi
effect:
Assault 2
Allies have -2 ATK while defending against this ally.
"I've never hunted prey that had already been claimed by the earth, but I look forward to the challenge."

name: Blustering Winds
effect: Talent: Balance
"The Scourge are nothing more than leaves to be blown aside in the Earthmother's presence." -Brahu Starsear

name: Bolvar, Highlord of Fordragon Hold
effect:
Untargetable
When this ally enters play, you may search your deck for a card named Fordragon Hold and put it into your resource row face up and exhausted.
Death Rattle: Put each location you control into its owner's hand.
"Arthas! The blood of your father... of your people... demands justice!"

name: Boots of the Renewed Flight
effect: When this armor prevents damage, you may pay 4. If you do, draw a card.
"It would be wise of us to gain the favor of the Aspects if we wish for additional aid against the Lich King." -Shail, Strategist Supreme

name: Bronthea the Resolute
effect:
You can strike with [Paladin] weapons you control while this ally is in combat.
[Paladin] armor you control can prevent damage that would be dealt to this ally.
"We must fortify ourselves if we are to withstand the onslaught of the Scourge."

name: Brother Keltan
effect:
Argent Crusade Reputation
When this or another Unique ally enters play under your control, it may deal 2 unpreventable holy damage to target ally.
"We cannot defeat the Lich King on our own. Divided, all of us will fail!"

name: Burly Berta
effect:
Assault 2
When this ally deals damage to a hero, you may draw a card.
Death Rattle: Target ally you control has Assault 2 this turn.
Her actions speak lounder than her words ever could.

name: Cedric Darwin
effect: When this ally enters play, you may search target player's deck for a card and remove it from the game.
"Your thoughts betray you."

name: Charger
effect:
You pay 1 less to complete quests.
When you place a resource face up, your hero may deal 1 unpreventable holy damage to target hero or ally. Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to a second target hero or ally this turn.
(Mounts can't attack or be attacked.)
The mighty charger serves as the steed for all those who serve the Light.

name: Cloak of the Shadowed Sun
effect:
Your hero has Protector.
[Druid] Hero: Opposing allies have -1 ATK.
[Warrior] Hero: Opposing allies have -1 [Health].
Imbued with the energy of both the light and the darkness.

name: Colossal Skull-Clad Cleaver
effect:
When an opposing ally is destroyed, add a skull counter.
This weapon has Assault 1 for each skull counter.
"Its gruesome appearance is matched only by its insatiable hunger for victims." -Triton the Sacrilegious

name: Commander Falstaav
effect:
Argent Crusade Reputation
Protector
Once per turn: 2 Target Unique ally has +X ATK this turn, where X is its ATK.
"Dispatch the Scourge will all the zeal you can muster!"

name: Conqueror Hashkon
effect: When this ally enters play, he deals 3 nature damage divided as you choose to any number of target opposing Priests.
"The fury of the elements will not stop until your precious shield is broken down."

name: Conqueror Vun'jin
effect: When this ally enters play, target an opposing Paladin ally. You control it and it has Protector while this ally remains under your control.
"Ya be blinded by your devotion, bruddah."

name: Conqueror Zaala
effect: At the start of your turn, you may remove another ally you control from the game. If you do, remove target Druid ally, [Druid] ability, or [Druid] equipment from the game.
"The more you run, the worse this will be for you."

name: Conversing With the Depths
effect:
Pay 3 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card for each five cards in your graveyard.
"Do as she says, lest you incur her wrath and bring ruin upon all of the tuskarr." -Elder Mana'loa

name: Crusade Commander Entari
effect:
Argent Crusade Reputation
At the end of your turn, this ally deals 1 unpreventable holy damage to each opposing hero and ally for each Unique ally you control.
"Where both the Alliance and the Horde failed, the Argent Crusade succeeded."

name: Crusade Engineer Spitzpatrick
effect:
Argent Crusade Reputation
Protector
When this or another Unique ally enters play under your control, you may draw a card.
"We need fuel, and they need to die. We call that a 'win-win.'"

name: Crusader Farisa
effect: Talent: Holy
Professions: Jewelcrafting, Tailoring
"With the Sunwell restored, we Blood Knights must turn our energy to the north and test our new strength against another great evil."

name: Crusader Lord Dalfors
effect:
Argent Crusade Reputation
If a Unique ally you control would be dealt damage, prevent 1 of it.
"We need every able-bodied man and woman to help keep the tide of evil at bay."

name: Curse of Doom
effect: Talent: Affliction

name: Cycle of Life
effect:
If an ally entered play and an ally left play this turn: Pay 2 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card.
"Ysera sleeps in the Emerald Dream, watching over both the Dream and Azeroth." -Nishera the Garden Keeper

name: Daralis the Sanctifier
effect: When you play an Ongoing [Priest] ability, this ally may deal 3 unpreventable holy damage to target hero or ally.
"Each Scourge I see is just another target that must be cleansed in a bath of holy fire."

name: Dark Command
effect: Talent: Blood
"The power of death compels you." -Randolphe Mortimer

name: Dementia
effect: Talent: Shadow
"Maintain your composure against the Scourge, or you will quickly descend into madness." -Deacon Markus Hallow

name: Devastation
effect: Talent: Destruction
"All will soon be laid to waste." -Kileana the Inferno

name: Devona Berkshire
effect:
While you control a Death Knight or Warrior, this ally has Protector.
While you control a Hunter or Shaman, this ally has Assault 2.
While you control a Priest or Druid, this ally has Mend 2.
"Look to me, and the Light will give us strength."

name: Dhoros Ravestrike
effect: 3 [>] This ally has Assault 3 this turn.
"Patience will always pay off in the end."

name: Dire Bear Form
effect: Talent: Feral
The grizzly personification of Ursoc the Mighty.

name: Dorzok Shadowhand
effect: When this ally deals combat damage, if you have no cards in your hand, draw a card.
"When the best laid plans fail, be sure to have a plan B."

name: Drain Essence
effect: Talent: Affliction
"I will give you but a moment to make your peace with this life." -Kristoff Manchester

name: Dread Doomguard
effect:
At the start of your turn, choose at random "ability," "equipment," or "resource."
When this ally deals damage while attacking, you may destroy target card of the kind chosen this turn.

name: Durzion, Champion of A'dal
effect: Talent: Holy
Professions: Blacksmithing, Mining
"Pray for those who willingly gave all they had to combat this great evil."

name: Earthmender Vaaki
effect: Talent: Restoration
Professions: Inscription, Tailoring
"The elements have been weakened by the presence of the Scourge, but I promise you that it will not hinder my abilities."

name: Eitrigg
effect:
Argent Crusade Reputation
Protector
Cards everywhere are Unique.
"We are bound by blood and honor, brother. I will not forget you."

name: Eris Havenfire
effect: When this or another Priest ally enters play under your control, the next time target hero or ally would be dealt damage this turn, prevent it.
"I failed once before, but perhaps you...?"

name: Esonea
effect: Talent: Arms
Professions: Inscription, Tailoring
"Those that have been brought back by the curse of undeath must be freed so that their souls may rest."

name: Expertise of Steel
effect: Talent: Arms
"Take great care in choosing your weapon, and you will be sure to find harmony with it in battle." -Indalarnar

name: Explosive Flames
effect: Talent: Fire
"With every Scourge death, its mindless brethren will be punished tenfold!" -Blythe the Pyromaniac

name: Explosive Shot
effect: Talent: Survival
"Enjoy the fireworks, mon." -The Longeye

name: Eyes of the Beast
effect: Talent: Beast Mastery
"Beware the beast that shares a mind with its master." -Bloodsoul

name: Fading Glow
effect: When combat damage is dealth with this weapon, your hero heals 2 damage from itself.
"You are a fool if you think that I can be defeated so easily!" - Andarius the Damned

name: Father Gustav
effect:
Argent Crusade Reputation
You pay 1 less to play Unique allies, to a minimum of 1.
"There exists no greater calling for a champion than to fight for the Argent Crusade."

name: Feast of Flame
effect: Talent: Fire, Destruction

name: Final Voyage
effect:
When you strike with this weapon, your hero has Long-Range this combat.
This weapon has Assault 1 for each card in opposing hands.
"Allow me to give you an appropriate send-off." -Gramm Thunderjaw

name: Fist of the Deity
effect:
Your hero has Dual Wield.
When this weapon enters play, it has +2 ATK this turn.
"Be sure you have a tight grip; Mam'toth's power should not be taken lightly." -Earthmender Vaaki

name: Flash of Brilliance
effect: Talent: Arcane
"It is important to search for the flow of magic in even the most unlikely places." -Spellweaver Jihan

name: Flawless Defense
effect: Talent: Protection
"Run while you still can - I will hold them off." -Kaniya the Steadfast

name: Flesh Eating Poison
effect: Talent: Poison

name: Fordragon Hold
effect:
[Activate] [>] Target [Alliance] hero or ally you control has Assault 1 this turn.
If you control an ally with Bolvar in its name: [Activate] [>] [Alliance] heroes and allies you control have Assault 1 this turn.

name: Fright
effect: Talent: Shadow
"Keep your enemies running scared, and surely they can never harm you." -Spiritualist Sunshroud

name: Frost Fever
effect: Talent: Frost
"Before you know it, your body will be entombed in frost, inside and out." -Krunkle Deadspark

name: Frozen Solid
effect: Talent: Frost
"If you try to wiggle, it's only going to hurt more." -Loraala the Frigid

name: Fusion Totem
effect: Talent: Elemental

name: Gift of the Earthmother
effect: Talent: Restoration
"I would not advise you to test the limits of the Earthmother." -Harona Proudmane

name: Gift of the Pious
effect: Talent: Restoration, Protection
"There is always strength in numbers." -Bronson Greatwhisker

name: Gloves of Token Respect
effect:
On your turn: 2 [>] Put a 1 [Nature] / 1 [Health] Spider ally token into play.
[Activate], Destroy this armor [>] Put a copy of target ally token into play.
"There are times in battle when the enemy of my enemy is my friend." -Marlowe Christophers

name: Goru Thornmane
effect:
Assault 2
When this ally deals damage while attacking, you may destroy target equipment.
"Do you see how quickly nature can dismantle even the most powerful weapons?"

name: Gramm Thunderjaw
effect: Talent: Survival
Professions: Jewelcrafting, Tailoring
"The Scourge could learn a thing or two about strategy and cunning. I can see them coming from a mile away."

name: Grumdur Bladebane
effect:
Protector
Each opposing ally has -1 ATK during its controller's turn.
"Did you really think such a small hindrance could stay the hand of death?"

name: Gushing Totem
effect: Talent: Restoration
"Have patience, for when the time comes, the elements will provide you all the energy you need." -Kinivus the Focused

name: Hail of Arrows
effect: Talent: Marksmanship
"The Scourge won't escape the storm that is headed their way." -Feera Quickshot

name: Hanthal Lightward
effect:
Protector
Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to this ally by attackers with Assault.
"In your hurried attempts to kill me, has it never occurred to you that I am merely the bait?"

name: Harona Proudmane
effect: Talent: Restoration
Professions: Mining, Tailoring
"In time, the earth will heal all wounds, but only if we manage to cleanse the land of this vile corruption."

name: Haunting Call
effect:
2, Exhaust your hero [>] Remove three target cards in one opposing graveyard from the game. Add a spirit counter for each ally removed this way.
At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 shadow damage to each opposing hero for each spirit counter.
"It's like they never even existed at all." -Felbender Lara

name: Helm of Vital Protection
effect:
Weapons you control have +1 ATK.
Other armor you control have +1 [Defense].
"You've got a good head on your shoulders - just make sure it stays there." -Keward the Ravager

name: High Commander Halford Wyrmbane
effect:
Protector
This ally has Assault 1 and Mend 1 for each other ally you control.
"The first strike belongs to us, and the last strike is all that our enemies see."

name: Highlord Tirion Fordring
effect:
[Druid], [Paladin], [Priest], or [Shaman] Hero Required
Argent Crusade Reputation
Unique allies you control can't be targeted by opponents.
On your turn: [Activate] [>] Put target Unique ally from your graveyard into play.
"The Argent Crusade comes for you, Arthas!"

name: Hit and Run
effect: Talent: Combat, Enhancement
"The lumbering brutes of the Scourge don't stand a change against our speed and quickness." -Zorak'tul

name: Holy Barrier
effect: Talent: Protection, Discipline
"If we work together, then we are sure to have greater success against the Scourge." -Joren the Martyr

name: Holy Fury
effect: Talent: Holy
"I watched as the Light poured over its body, leaving the once-vile creature as nothing more than a pile of ash." -Thoros the Savior

name: Holy Guardian
effect:
Protector
Damage that this ally would deal is unpreventable.
If shadow ([Shadow]) damage would be dealt, prevent all but 1 of it.
"Not all blessings come in the form of a Power Word." -Marta Spires

name: Hood of the Exodus
effect: When an ally you control with Assault deals combat damage to an opponent's hero, he discards a card.
"It can be hard to keep a clear head in the heat of battle." -Dralor

name: Hurdan the Everlasting
effect: When you play a non-Ongoing [Priest] ability, if this ally is in your graveyard, you may pay 2. If you do, put him into play.
"It will take more than that to lay my spirit to rest."

name: Hysteria
effect: Talent: Blood
"You would be surprised how far you can push yourself when your sanity has been stripped." -Krog the Deathfist

name: I'm Not Dead Yet!
effect:
On your turn: Pay 3 to complete this quest.
Reward: Put a 1 [Holy] / 1 [Health] Unique Priest ally token named Father Kamaros into play with Mend 4.
"I cannot make it on my own, but with your help, I may yet live to fight the Scourge once more." -Father Kamaros

name: Ice Nova
effect: Talent: Frost
"Northrend's frozen landscape provides me with quite the powerful tools." -"Black Ice" Fizzlefreeze

name: Idol of the Shooting Star
effect:
2, [Activate] [>] Your hero heals 2 damage from target hero or ally.
When you play an ally, ready this item.
"May the light of Elune bring you safety and comfort." -Eriun Moonglow

name: Impede
effect: Talent: Arms
"You are truly weak if you put all your stake in a flimsy staff." -Halavar

name: Infusion of Earth
effect: Talent: Enhancement
"The earth need only grant you a fraction of its strength for you to see overwhelming results." -Ringleader Kurna

name: Ixiya the Attuned
effect: Protector, Mend 1
"Through me, the elements will achieve balance."

name: Jeremiah Karvok
effect: Talent: Destruction
Professions: Leatherworking, Skinning
"My methods can be quite disturbing, but I challenge you to question my results."

name: Justicar Drathnea
effect: When this ally deals damage to a Paladin, that Paladin's controller discards a card.
"Enough hiding. I only require a moment of time with your mind."

name: Justicar Nimzi Banedrizzle
effect: When this ally leaves play, you may remove target Druid ally, [Druid] ability, or [Druid] equipment from the game.
"One must be careful when burying a warlock, lest the gravesite become corrupted." -Maleo the Blur

name: Justicar Ularu
effect: When this ally enters combat for the first time on each of your turns, ready him if a Priest is defending.
"Enough of your mind games!"

name: Kaelyn Vineminder
effect: When this ally enters play, target opposing ally can't ready during its controller's ready step while this ally remains under your control.
"You shall be imprisoned by the very earth that you seek to destroy!"

name: Katoka Dreadblade
effect: When this ally enters play, you may exhaust target hero or ally. If it's not your turn, this ally deals 1 melee damage to that character. If it's your turn, draw a card.
"Run in fear, weaklings!"

name: Keeper Remulos
effect: When a Druid you control deals combat damage to a hero, put two 1 [Melee] / 1 [Health] Treant ally tokens into play.
"Is the world prepared for what we are about to invoke? I do not know..."

name: Kick Thinking
effect: Talent: Arcane, Combat
"Sharp reflexes are good, but a sharp mind is better." -Cerripha Sunstreak

name: Kor'kron Vanguard
effect:
[Activate] [>] Target [Horde] hero or ally you control has Assault 1 this turn.
If you control an ally with Saurfang in its name: [Activate] [>] Target [Horde] hero or ally you control has Assault 3 this turn.

name: Krog the Deathfist
effect: Talent: Blood
Professions: Engineering, Tailoring
"The Lich King and his wretched minions will soon regret their decision to defile what was once my honorable death."

name: Krunkle Deadspark
effect: Talent: Blood
Professions: Alchemy, Enchanting
"Some would deem my current state to be a curse, but I find this new experience quite fascinating."

name: Kungen the Thunderer
effect: Talent: Arms
Professions: Inscription, Tailoring
Thunder follows lightning, but Kungen's enemies hear him before they see the light.

name: Lady Bancroft
effect: Prevent all damage that opposing heroes would deal to this ally.
"The Scourge will be the first to attest that I am truly blessed."

name: Landro's Gift
effect: Search your deck for a Loot card, reveal it, and put it on top of your deck. Then, if an opponent controls more resources than you, draw a card.
"Roll the dice and see if you get lucky!" -Landro Longshot

name: Leggings of the Honored
effect: This armor has +4 [Defense] if an ally entered a graveyard this turn.
"In time, you shall be remembered for your past deeds." -Lanthus the Restorer

name: Lesson of the Arcane
effect: Talent: Arcane
"Oops, try again." -Ruby Gemsparkle

name: Lesson of the Beast
effect: Talent: Beast Mastery
"Tear that thing to pieces!" -Kassandra Flameheart

name: Lesson of the Call
effect: Talent: Fury
"Leave the fighting to the big boys. I wouldn't want you to get hurt." -Lord Benjamin Tremendouson

name: Lesson of the Divine
effect: Talent: Protection
"This new technique is quite stunning." -Zophos the Vengeful

name: Lesson of the Elements
effect: Talent: Elemental
"Living or dead, flesh and bone are equally conducive to the elements' fury." -Urrth

name: Lesson of the Grave
effect: Talent: Unholy

name: Lesson of the Light
effect: Talent: Holy
"No one can escape their sins." -Sister Remba

name: Lesson of the Nether
effect: Talent: Demonology
"You can't hide from me!" -Plague Fleshbane

name: Lesson of the Shadow
effect: Talent: Subtlety
"Don't try to follow unless you think you are up to the challenge." -Meganna the Stalker

name: Lesson of the Wild
effect: Talent: Balance
Even the most threatening beasts looks peaceful in their slumber.

name: Libram of Radiance
effect:
1, [Activate] [>] Your hero deals 1 unpreventable holy damage to target hero or ally.
When you play a [Paladin] armor, ready this item.
"May the light of Elune bring you safety and comfort" -Eriun Moonglow

name: Life and Death
effect:
When you play an ally, you may draw a card.
When an ally you control leaves play, discard a card.
"Your fate rests in my hands." -Jeremiah Karvok

name: Life-Binder's Locket
effect:
[Paladin] Hero: [Activate], Discard a card [>] If a friendly hero or ally would be dealt damage this turn, prevent 1 of it.
[Priest] Hero: [Activate], Discard a card [>] The next time target hero or ally would be dealt damage this turn, prevent it.

name: Lifeblade of Belgaristrasz
effect:
Finishing Move: Rogue (To play, remove X Rogues in your graveyard from the game, where X is 5 or less.)
When this weapon enters play, your hero deals X damage to target hero or ally and heals X damage from itself.
"The red dragonflight will do whatever it can to help end this conflict with Malygos." -Belgaristrasz

name: Light Within the Darkness
effect:
If a hero or ally you controlled dealt holy ([Holy]) damage this turn: Pay 1 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card.
Trion will desire the last remnant of the great crusader.

name: Lunira Swiftbreath
effect: Talent: Restoration
Professions: Blacksmithing, Inscription
"We must push the Scourge back into Icecrown, or the land itself may never recover."

name: Lynxia
effect: At the start of each turn, you may exhaust target ally.
"As the master wishes."

name: Lyshala Ravenshot
effect: This ally has Long-Range while an opponent controls an ally with cost 4 or more.
"Staying alive is as simple as keeping your distance."

name: Master Poisoner
effect: Talent: Assassination
"A little dab of this, a little pinch of that, and voila! A masterpiece!" -Tysandri Duskstrike

name: Master's Stable
effect: Talent: Beast Mastery, Demonology
"You and I are not that different. It's just a matter of how willing our pets are to serve us." -Fellbender Lara

name: Mithran the Sniper
effect: When an opposing ability, ally, or equipment enters play, destroy this ally. If you do, destroy that opposing card.
"I've got an itchy trigger finger, so don't tempt me."

name: Mojo Master Zandum
effect: Talent: Holy
Professions: Leatherworking, Skinning
"If ya need me, there be no harm in callin' for help, bruddah. We must all work together if we gonna stop da Scourge."

name: Mongoose Bite
effect: Talent: Survival
"I thought I could beat her in close-quarters... Boy was I wrong!" -Galway Steamwhistle

name: Mortal Slash
effect: Talent: Arms
"Enough tricks. Now you die!" -Emmi Sprinklestrike

name: Mothra
effect:
Protector
When this ally exhausts, ready up to three resources you control.
"No need to run. Mothra will protect us from Gahz'rilla!" -Grumpherys

name: Murphy Watson
effect: This ally has Assault 3 while an ally is in your graveyard.
"I will ignite a fiery inferno and burn everything to ash before I serve the Lich King again!"

name: Muruna the Savage
effect:
Protector
Allies you control have +2 [Health] while you control a Form.
"There's nothing like the fury of Ursoc to help rally the troops."

name: Nature's Vengeance
effect: Talent: Balance
"In the face of death, nature itself will take up arms against the Scourge." -Gwon Strongbark

name: Nerubian Conqueror
effect:
When you strike with this weapon, your hero has Long-Range this combat.
If a card would enter an opposing graveyard, remove it from the game instead.
"Even the ancient kings of the nerubian empire will tremble before it." - Ona Skyshot

On your turn: Pay 3 to complete this quest.
